files.README.md:
# Agent Skills

These skills are intended to be used from within the Nix devshell environment defined in this repository.

So, first drop into the shell:

```sh
nix develop github:cdata/agent-skills
```

Then, you can launch your agent. Don't forget to set your Gemini API key!

```sh
export GEMINI_API_KEY="..."
claude
```
